Posts.EditableText: Yep, ```\s*``` matches zero or more whitespace characters; and ```(?<=\S)``` matches the zero-width space between characters where the previous character was not whitespace (basically ensuring that if's preceded by several ```(x|y|z|)``` conditions, at least one of them matched something)

"Like hint about #object#;tell me about #object#, except using | instead of ;? (KV)"
